name: Spicy Slow Cooker BBQ Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: ketchup, yellow mustard, apricot preserve, chipotle pepper, garlic, ginger, worcestershire sauce, apple cider vinegar, salt, ground black pepper, pork shoulder, sausage link, baby back ribs
recipeIngredient: ½ cup chipotle peppers, canned and diced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients for the sweet ‘n’ spicy sauce.
In a slow cooker, place all protein and pour sauce over until evenly coated.
On high, cook for 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours.
Portion any meat with a side of veggies and the spicy sauce.
